SampleApp
tk.​Tk
SampleApp

It is the controller class. It initializes the frame definitions and has control over which frame to display.  SampleApp object contains attributes:

  • title_font: stores font style, font size etc font attributes

  • frames: it is a python dictionary object and stores information about each frame
